item.title: About
item.description: I'm currently a Lead Software Engineer working at Matillion in Manchester (UK) where I lead a strong team of highly skilled engineers with focus on technical excellence and career progression. Working with Amazon Web Services, Google Cloud Platform and Microsoft Azure I architect and lead the engineering effort to build efficient, scaling services and applications. I'm a passionate engineer who loves programming in languages such as Go, Java, JavaScript, Python, just to name a few and I believe in writing high quality, maintainable and testable code.
